sentences.en: A fall into the pit, a gain in your wit.
sentences.cn: 吃一堑, 长一智.

sentences.en: a five-foot deep pit
sentences.cn: 五英尺深的坑

sentences.en: A gold mine is not a bottomless pit, the gold runs out.
sentences.cn: 金矿并非无底的宝藏，金子终究会被采光。

sentences.en: a national strike against pit closures
sentences.cn: 抗议关闭煤矿井的全国性罢工

sentences.en: A sheep fell into a pit, and I helped it out.
sentences.cn: 一只羊掉进坑里, 我把它弄了出来.

sentences.en: an inspection pit
sentences.cn: 汽车检修坑

sentences.en: Dad first went down the pit (= worked in a coal mine ) when he was 15 years old.
sentences.cn: 爸爸第一次下煤矿井时才15岁。

sentences.en: Eric lost his footing and began to slide into the pit.
sentences.cn: 埃里克一脚踩空，开始往坑里滑。

sentences.en: He had to make four pit stops during the race.
sentences.cn: 他不得不在比赛过程中4次停车进站。

sentences.en: He was convicted of failing to muzzle a pit bull.
sentences.cn: 他因没能给比特犬戴嘴套而被判有罪。

sentences.en: He worked all his life down the pit.
sentences.cn: 他一辈子在矿井下工作.

sentences.en: He's a bottomless pit as far as food is concerned.
sentences.cn: 他吃起东西来肚子像个无底洞。

sentences.en: Her heart went pit-a-pat.
sentences.cn: 她心里扑扑直跳。

sentences.en: His heart went pit - a - pat.
sentences.cn: 他的心怦怦地跳.

sentences.en: I had a funny feeling in the pit of my stomach.
sentences.cn: 我心头有种怪怪的感觉。

sentences.en: The female digs a pit in which to lay the eggs.
sentences.cn: 雌性挖坑产卵。

sentences.en: The pit is ventilated by a steel fan.
sentences.cn: 矿井中用钢制通风机来保持空气流通。

sentences.en: The sides of the pit fell in and buried Tom and Dick.
sentences.cn: 坑壁坍塌,把汤姆和迪克埋在里面.

sentences.en: There isn't a bottomless pit of money for public spending.
sentences.cn: 并非有用之不尽的钱用于公共开支.

sentences.en: We dug a deep pit in the yard.
sentences.cn: 我们在院子中挖了个深洞。
